content: the whole argument of “OKC’s roster isnt that bad” is completely misguided — yes, the roster isn’t awful. they’re great defensively. but they are undeniably awful offensively, which is why russ needs to create literally everything on offense. name another player on OKC who can create anything offensively for themselves or for others! kanter? he can score but he’s a black hole, and one on one low post play isn’t effective offense in the modern nba. oladipo is ok, but he’s streaky as hell and is way better off the ball. after that, who? nobody.
